title: Sampler, 1753
medium:
Medium: silk, linen
Technique:embroidered in cross stitch and flame stitch on plain weave foundation
inscribed: mary freeman aged 10 years july the 20th 1753
creditline: Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers
description: Very finely worked in colored silk on a fine natural linen ground.  Running vine border, bargello panels, and a verse, "Youth and judgement."
